summary: Website project for ARDEE INDUSTRIES focused on aluminum can trading.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for a company named "ARDEE INDUSTRIES" focused on aluminum can trading, with clear navigation and English user-facing text.
Implement core pages/sections relevant to aluminum can trading: Home (overview), Trading (how it works / what is traded), About, and Contact/Inquiry.

Add an Inquiry form for aluminum can trading requests that collects: name, company (optional), email or phone, inquiry type (Buy / Sell / Partnership), location (optional), estimated quantity (optional), message, and consent checkbox; validate required fields client-side and show success/error states.
Add an admin area in the frontend that uses Internet Identity login and allows an authenticated admin to view submitted inquiries in a list and open a details view.
Define a coherent, distinctive visual theme for ARDEE INDUSTRIES and apply it consistently across typography, spacing, buttons, cards, and page layout (avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors).
Add required generated static images to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (e.g., logo and hero visuals) without routing images through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website named ARDEE INDUSTRIES for aluminum can trading
Create backend persistence for Inquiry submissions in the single Motoko main actor, including: createInquiry, listInquiries (admin-only), and getInquiry (admin-only).

imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Industrial wordmark logo reading "ARDEE INDUSTRIES" (ardee-industries-logo.dim_1024x256.png)
- Hero background illustration featuring aluminum cans / recycled aluminum texture in an industrial style (hero-aluminum-trading.dim_1920x900.png)
- Seamless pattern texture of aluminum cans or aluminum surface (aluminum-pattern.dim_1024x1024.png)

generatedImages.description: Hero background illustration featuring aluminum cans / recycled aluminum texture in an industrial style
Seamless pattern texture of aluminum cans or aluminum surface
